definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Do all Chinese people lowly bones when they were born?
sentences.chinese: 中国人难道都是贱骨头吗？

sentences.english: The rotter was not afraid of being beaten. He even said how sorry he was.
sentences.chinese: 他这贱骨头打不怕，还要说可怜可怜哩。

sentences.english: Jian Gutou at least those who buy Japanese goods has been.
sentences.chinese: 至少那些贱骨头买不到日本货了。

definition: lit. to climb all over sb/fig. to take advantage of sb's weakness
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
susceptible to force but not persuasion
lit. not to shed a tear until one sees the coffin (idiom)/fig. refuse to be convinced until one is faced with grim reality
pinyin: bu4 jian4 guan1 cai5 bu4 luo4 lei4

definition: lit. a dog can't stop himself from eating shit (idiom)/fig. bad habits are hard to change
pinyin: gou3 gai3 bu4 liao3 chi1 shi3

definition: unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
to know no shame/to be totally shameless
